Title: S6 Ep. 244 Chad Hoover - Future of Game Industry
Description:
Chad Hoover is the founder of Game Dev, The BoardGame and Fenix Studios. Chad is a community builder which goes hand in hand with games, teams, and having fun.  Chad’s career journey was one that had some twists and turns; and ultimately led him to self-discovery that left him feeling refreshed and excited for the future. His 5 words that describe him are Driven, Dedicated, Determined, Project Manager. He is that and more. For all those fans of gameDevelopment, be sure to check out his Kickstarter campaign that launches Game Dev, the BoardGame.
